segments.text: To which gate do I need to go to catch connection flight Ll 01 to Madrid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go to gate 18 . The plane is boarding now . You should hurry up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Show me the fastest way to get there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Instead of walking.you can take this shuttle to get you there faster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think the plane will leave without me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'll call the attendants at the gate to tell them that you are on your way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much . I really appreciate that .
segments.speaker: S1
